view-entity.title: Work Effort Note And Note Data Entity
Work Effort And Party Assignment By Group Entity
view-entity.description: Also includes PartyRelationship Link so that a groupPartyId can be specified to find all PartyAssignments for all groups a party is in

view-entity.title: Work Effort And Party Assignment By Role Entity
view-entity.description: Also includes PartyRole Link so that if a partyId is specified it will find all PartyAssignments for all roles a party is in; does not link on the partyId of the PartyAssignment
